item.description:
PLEASE RSVP YES WITH ONLY ONE MEETUP GROUP THIS ENSURES AN ACCURATE COUNT

Fellow happy hourer, Biagio, has arranged for yet another mix and mingle....which is a joint event of several meetup groups.

Below, I've copied some details from the group for which Biagio organizes.

Kitty OSheas is an awesome spot to host another Mix and Mingle cross Meetup party for 150 members on Friday, October 17, 2008!

This is NOT a Singles party. So anyone can come that means couples are also welcome. Let's get to know one another and socialize.

Note: This time the music will be half as loud in the main room and turned very low or off in the back room so members can have a separate area to chat.

Location: Kitty OSheas is in Boston (near Faneuil Hall) 131 State St Boston, MA 02109 617-725-0100
Kitty Link

The 2nd floor can hold 150 people. There are 2 bars upstairs, 4 huge comfy couches, AC, its own DJ area with light machine and dance floor as well as its own bathroom, so we would truly have our own private party.

Biagio is ordering $220 worth of appetizers (wings/veggie platter, cheeses etc) because their Kitchen is small and we will never get enough food for 150 members. The bar will cover the cost to refill any appetizer platters, so people can eat what they want.

This cost includes the whole 2nd floor, 3 bartenders and the DJ so its not all just to cover the food!
EVERYONE, whether you eat or not, please pay Biagio $5, to help cover the cost of this event. Please find Biagio(his photo) at the party to pay him. He is the ONLY person you should pay.

AS ALWAYS YOU MUST MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER

Please note : After 9PM the bar charges a mandatory $10 cover just to get in so members must arrive before 9PM.

After 9PM if we have over 100 people upstairs we can keep the 2nd floor to ourselves all night.

In other words get there before 9PM so you don't have to pay the cover and we can have the 2nd floor to ourselves.

Meetup Groups are:

Social Fun

Single in the 'City'

Beantown & Beyond

Metro West Singles

Chestnut Hill Social

Boston Euro Social

Boston Night Life

There were about 185 members at each of the last few Mix and Mingle cross Meetup parties. There were also a few members who could not get in because they came to late and it was full. So, RSVP now and arrive early.

It should be fun and hope you can all join us for this blast of a party!
Ciao,
Biagio
item.how_to_find_us: The entire second floor has been reserved for Meetup
item.name: Boston Mix + Mingle Part 4
